Sentencas: Reversible solid oxide cells (SOCs) are potentially useful for electrical energy storage due to their good storage scalability, but have not been seriously considered due to concerns over round-trip efficiency.
Titulo: High efficiency electrical energy storage using a methane-oxygen solid oxide cell

Sentencas: Here we propose an SOC storage chemistry where the fuel cycles between H2O-CO2-rich and CH4-H-2-rich gases.
Titulo: High efficiency electrical energy storage using a methane-oxygen solid oxide cell

Sentencas: The unique feature is the formation of CH4 during electrolysis, a less endothermic process than the usual H-2- or CO-forming reactions, enabling improved efficiency.
Titulo: High efficiency electrical energy storage using a methane-oxygen solid oxide cell

Sentencas: Thermodynamic calculations and preliminary experiments show that the CH4-rich storage chemistry is produced during SOC operation at reduced temperature (similar to 600 degrees C) and/or increased pressure (similar to 10 atm).
Titulo: High efficiency electrical energy storage using a methane-oxygen solid oxide cell

Sentencas: Balance of plant storage system requirements are discussed briefly.
Titulo: High efficiency electrical energy storage using a methane-oxygen solid oxide cell
